rule.description: Add a quick openHAB textual rule

item changed.description: Item Some_Item changed - place in 'when' section

item received command.description: Item Some_Item received command - place in 'when' section

item received update.description: Item Some_Item received update - place in 'when' section

system shuts down.description: System shuts down - place in 'when' section

time.description: Time cron expression - place in 'when' section

sendBroadcastNotification.description: openHAB Action: Send a broadcast notification e.g. to your phone

sendHttpGetRequest.description: openHAB Action: Sends an GET-HTTP request and returns the result as a String

sendHttpPutRequest.description: openHAB Action: Sends a PUT-HTTP request with the given content and returns the result as a String

sendHttpPostRequest.description: openHAB Action: Sends a POST-HTTP request with the given content and returns the result as a String

sendHttpDeleteRequest.description: openHAB Action: Sends a DELETE-HTTP request and returns the result as a String

createTimer.description: openHAB Action: schedules a block of code to execute at a future time

getThingStatusInfo.description: openHAB Action: Gets status information of the given thing identified by `thingUID`

setMasterVolume.description: Sets the volume of the host machine (volume in range 0-1)

increaseMasterVolume.description: Increases the volume by the given percent

decreaseMasterVolume.description: Decreases the volume by the given percent

getMasterVolume.description: Returns the current volume as a float between 0 and 1

playSound.description: Plays the given sound file. The file must be an mp3 or wav and located in ${openhab.home}/sounds

playStream.description: Plays the audio stream at the given url

say.description: Says the given text through Text-to-Speech

say:v.description: Says the given text through the given voice (depends on the TTS engine and voices installed)

a:say.description: Says the given text through the given voice to the given output device (Mac OSX only).

logDebug.description: logDebug(String loggerName, String format, Object... args)

logInfo.description: logInfo(String loggerName, String format, Object... args)

logWarn.description: logWarn(String loggerName, String format, Object... args)

logError.description: logError(String loggerName, String format, Object... args)

lastUpdate.description: <item>.lastUpdate - Query for the last update timestamp of a given item.

historicState.description: <item>.historicState(AbstractInstant) - Retrieves the historic item at a certain point in time

changedSince.description: <item>.changedSince(AbstractInstant) - Checks if the state of the item has (ever) changed since a certain point in time

updatedSince.description: <item>.updatedSince(AbstractInstant) - Checks if the state of the item has been updated since a certain point in time

maximumSince.description: <item>.maximumSince(AbstractInstant) - Gets the Item with the maximum value (state) since a certain point in time

minimumSince.description: <item>.minimumSince(AbstractInstant) - Gets the Item with the minimum value (state) since a certain point in time

averageSince.description: <item>.averageSince(AbstractInstant) - Gets the average value of the state of a given item since a certain point in time.

deltaSince.description: <item>.deltaSince(AbstractInstant) - Gets the difference value of the state of a given item since a certain point in time.

previousState.description:
<item>.previousState() - Retrieves the previous item (returns HistoricItem).
<item>.previousState(true) - Retrieves the previous item, skips items with equal state values and searches the first item with state not equal the current state (returns HistoricItem).

sumSince.description: <item>.sumSince(AbstractInstant) - Retrieves the sum of the previous states since a certain point in time. (OpenHab 1.8)
